data.text:
Earlier today, Cascada announced the release of their first single in more than a year! The internationally successful dance act, who represented Germany in the 2013 Eurovision Song Contest, will release â€œIâ€™m Feeling It (In The Air) on October 2ndâ€¦ so just four weeks to go!

Are you ready to feel it?

â€œIâ€™m Feeling It (In The Air)â€ will be released by Zooland Music, the actâ€™s long-term music label, and will be Cascadaâ€™s first single release since â€œLike The Way I Doâ€ hit digital and streaming music services in August 2019. It is the latest in a series of non-album singles including tracks such as â€œBlinkâ€ abnd â€œReasonâ€ that have followed the release of â€œThe Best of Cascadaâ€ in 2013.

Cascada, consisting of vocalist Natalie Horler and producers DJ Manian and DJ Yanou, joined the Eurovision family after representing Germany in MalmÃ¶ at the 2013 Eurovision Song Contest. Despite placing 21st, â€œGloriousâ€ saw commercial success, particularly in homeland Germany with a peak position of #6. As a result, Cascada earned their first top 10 hit in Germany since 2009â€™s â€œEvacuate the Dancefloorâ€ and remains their most recent single to achieve such a feat.

Million-selling singles

The band rose to fame in the mid-2000s with the smash-hit singles â€œMiracleâ€ and â€œEverytime We Touchâ€. The latter was certified platinum in multiple nations including sales of over one million copies in the United States and more than 600,000 copies in the United Kingdom. The aforementioned 2009 single â€œEvacuate the Dancefloorâ€ saw similarly high levels of success and earned the band a #1 position in the United Kingdom and the Netherlands.

Are you looking forward to Cascadaâ€™s brand new single? Let us know your favourite Cascada single to date in the comments below!
